shape R rectangle
layer R 2
motion R 0 100 100 50 50 255 0 0        20 200 200 50 50 0 255 0 
motion R 20 200 200 50 50 0 255 0       40 300 300 50 50 0 0 255 
shape E ellipse
layer E 1
motion E 0 200 200 80 80 200 150 0       20 100 100 100 100 0 200 150 0 90

shape R2 rectangle
layer R2 0
